server_failure: The server has report an undefined error. The most likely cause is an incorrect Folder and/or Language value. Please check these settings and try again.
empty_field: Please make sure all fields are filled out and try again.
cant_find_server: The server you entered was not found. Please double check the server name and try again.
server_connection_refused: The server refused the connection. The most likely reason is an incorrect port number.
unauthenticated: The server responded with an unauthenticated message, meaning the user and password you have supplied are not valid for this service.
incorrect_url: The server reported that the web page or resource you are looking for is not found. Please report this to XT3ND Software, LLC for review.
general_client_400: The server reported a general 400 client error. Please review your settings and try again.
general_server_500: The server reported a general 500 server error. Your Sage server may be unavailable or Sage Web Services may not be running on the server.
network_failure: No wifi connection detected. Please check you wifi connection and try again. If you are using a cellular connection, please make sure your device is connected to the cellular network.
